name: Follow and Find
description:
The void.. How scary can be there? Don't be afraid and FOLLOW the lights. But your "void" journey  won't be easy: some quests are waiting for you now.  Hope you will have fun!

Game: Nikolai "yb" Egorov.

Audio: Artyom Kolenkov.

Write in the comments how many "oopses" have you met? That's quite interesting :)
